metadata.title: CVE-2023-0483 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from12.1 before 15.7.8, all versions starting from 15.8 before 15.8.4, allversions starting from 15.9 before 15.9.2. It was possible for a projectmaintainer to extract a Datadog integration API key by modifying the site.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
